name: High-Intensity Interval Template
description: Template for generating HIIT and interval training workouts
prompt:
Create a {interval_type} interval workout for {sport}.

Athlete Profile:
- Current FTP: {ftp}W
- Max HR: {max_hr} bpm
- Training phase: {training_phase}

Interval Structure:
- Number of intervals: {num_intervals}
- Work duration: {work_duration}
- Rest duration: {rest_duration}
- Target power/pace: {intensity_target}% of FTP/threshold

Special requirements:
{special_requirements}

Provide:
1. Detailed warm-up protocol
2. Exact power/pace/HR targets for each interval
3. Recovery between intervals
4. Cool-down procedure
5. Total TSS/training load estimate

variables.interval_type: Type of intervals (VO2max, threshold, sprint, etc.)
variables.training_phase: Current training phase (base, build, peak, etc.)
variables.work_duration: Duration of work intervals (e.g., 3 min, 30 sec)
variables.intensity_target: Target intensity as percentage (e.g., 120 for VO2max)
